text.text: "I took all the supplies.  I'm sorry."
"Someday I will wake up.  Someday I will wake up.  Someday I will wake up.  Someday I will"
"eat the walls"
"STAY QUIET"
"pray that you find the same peace I have found"
"IF YOU MOVE IT WILL HEAR YOU"
"My name is Susan Li.  If you're reading this, I'm dead.  I leave everything I own to"
"225 steps from the vending machines to the couch room…  141 steps from the couch room to the portal…"
"Welcome to Hell :)"
"Abandon hope, all ye who read this."
"know because I was wearing my watch.  Today was another bad day.  They nearly saw me as I hauled wood back to the big room, and I lost half of it running away.  Tomorrow, I plan"
"I AM IN A TOP SECRET FACILITY BUILT BY THE GOVERNMENT!!  I HAVE BEEN ILLEGALLY KIDNAPPED!!  PLEASE HELP ME!!"
"What do you want?  Am I supposed to confess??  What am I waiting for???"
"I AM IN A SMALL ROOM WITH MANY DESKS.  I CAN'T STAY HERE.  COME FIND ME."
This note has a bunch of lines all over it.  It looks like it might be a map, but nothing is labeled and you're already hopelessly lost.
This paper is covered in dried blood…  Gross.
This note is covered with tally marks, front to back.
This note just has scribbles on it.
"NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO"
"I KILLED THEM.  I HAD TO."
"Casey Blumenthal.  Age 34.  Bangor, Maine.  Hotel receptionist.  The last thing I remember was tripping on a power cord."
"STOP FOLLOWING ME"
"IT'S CHASING ME"

//: This category is for news before 1900 and should adopt the tone of voice of its era.
This category is for 'lost person' classified ads and newspaper snippets about people that have fallen into to the Backrooms, from any era.
This category is for snippets that don't make any logical sense.  They have been 'corrupted' by their movement into the Backrooms.
//2: Snippets in this category should not be translated.
